verses.text: And it came to pass \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w plague|strong="H4046"\w*, that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and unto \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Take|strong="H5375"\w* the \w sum|strong="H7218"\w* of all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, throughout their \w fathers’|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, all that are able to \w go|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H6635"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* with them in the \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* by \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \add near\add* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\add Take the sum of the people\add*, from \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*; as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

¶ \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, the \w eldest|strong="H1060"\w* son of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*; \w Hanoch|strong="H2585"\w*, \add of whom cometh\add* the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Hanochites|strong="H2599"\w*: of \w Pallu|strong="H6396"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Palluites|strong="H6384"\w*:

Of \w Hezron|strong="H2696"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Hezronites|strong="H2697"\w*: of \w Carmi|strong="H3756"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Carmites|strong="H3757"\w*.

These \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Reubenites|strong="H7206"\w*: and they that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them were \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w*.
And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pallu|strong="H6396"\w*; \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eliab|strong="H0446"\w*; \w Nemuel|strong="H5241"\w*, and \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w*, and \w Abiram|strong="H0048"\w*. This \add is that\add* \w Dathan|strong="H1885"\w* and \w Abiram|strong="H0048"\w*, \add which were\add* \w famous|strong="H7148"\w* in the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, who \w strove|strong="H5327"\w* against \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and against \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* in the \w company|strong="H5712"\w* of \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, when they \w strove|strong="H5327"\w* against the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:

And the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* her \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and swallowed them \w up|strong="H1104"\w* together with \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, when that \w company|strong="H5712"\w* \w died|strong="H4194"\w*, what time the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*: and they became a \w sign|strong="H5251"\w*.
Notwithstanding the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* not.

¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*: of \w Nemuel|strong="H5241"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Nemuelites|strong="H5242"\w*: of \w Jamin|strong="H3226"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Jaminites|strong="H3228"\w*: of \w Jachin|strong="H3199"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Jachinites|strong="H3200"\w*:\f + \fr 26.12 \ft Nemuel: also called, Jemuel\f*\f + \fr 26.12 \ft Jachin: also called, Jarib\f*

Of \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Zarhites|strong="H2227"\w*: of \w Shaul|strong="H7586"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Shaulites|strong="H7587"\w*.\f + \fr 26.13 \ft Zerah: also called, Zohar\f*

These \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Simeonites|strong="H8099"\w*, \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ The \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*: of \w Zephon|strong="H6827"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Zephonites|strong="H6831"\w*: of \w Haggi|strong="H2291"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Haggites|strong="H2291"\w*: of \w Shuni|strong="H7764"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Shunites|strong="H7765"\w*:\f + \fr 26.15 \ft Zephon: also called, Ziphion\f*

Of \w Ozni|strong="H0244"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Oznites|strong="H0244"\w*: of \w Eri|strong="H6179"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Erites|strong="H6180"\w*:\f + \fr 26.16 \ft Ozni: also called, Ezbon\f*

Of \w Arod|strong="H0720"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Arodites|strong="H0722"\w*: of \w Areli|strong="H0692"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Arelites|strong="H0692"\w*.\f + \fr 26.17 \ft Arod: also called, Arodi\f*

These \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* according to those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \add were\add* \w Er|strong="H6147"\w* and \w Onan|strong="H0209"\w*: and \w Er|strong="H6147"\w* and \w Onan|strong="H0209"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w* were; of \w Shelah|strong="H7956"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Shelanites|strong="H8024"\w*: of \w Pharez|strong="H6557"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Pharzites|strong="H6558"\w*: of \w Zerah|strong="H2226"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Zarhites|strong="H2227"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Pharez|strong="H6557"\w* were; of \w Hezron|strong="H2696"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Hezronites|strong="H2697"\w*: of \w Hamul|strong="H2538"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Hamulites|strong="H2539"\w*.

These \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* according to those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, threescore and \w sixteen|strong="H7657"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ \add Of\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*: \add of\add* \w Tola|strong="H8439"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Tolaites|strong="H8440"\w*: of \w Pua|strong="H6312"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Punites|strong="H6324"\w*:\f + \fr 26.23 \ft Pua: or, Phuvah\f*

Of \w Jashub|strong="H3437"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Jashubites|strong="H3432"\w*: of \w Shimron|strong="H8110"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Shimronites|strong="H8117"\w*.\f + \fr 26.24 \ft Jashub: or, Job\f*

These \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Issachar|strong="H3485"\w* according to those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ \add Of\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zebulun|strong="H2074"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*: of \w Sered|strong="H5624"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Sardites|strong="H5625"\w*: of \w Elon|strong="H0356"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Elonites|strong="H0440"\w*: of \w Jahleel|strong="H3177"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Jahleelites|strong="H3178"\w*.

These \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Zebulunites|strong="H2075"\w* according to those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.
¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w* \add were\add* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* and \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*.

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*: of \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Machirites|strong="H4354"\w*: and \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*: of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \add come\add* the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Gileadites|strong="H1569"\w*.

These \add are\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*: \add of\add* \w Jeezer|strong="H0372"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Jeezerites|strong="H0373"\w*: of \w Helek|strong="H2507"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Helekites|strong="H2516"\w*:\f + \fr 26.30 \ft Jeezer: also called Abiezer\f*

And \add of\add* \w Asriel|strong="H0844"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Asrielites|strong="H0845"\w*: and \add of\add* \w Shechem|strong="H7928"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Shechemites|strong="H7930"\w*:

And \add of\add* \w Shemida|strong="H8061"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Shemidaites|strong="H8062"\w*: and \add of\add* \w Hepher|strong="H2660"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Hepherites|strong="H2662"\w*.

¶ And \w Zelophehad|strong="H6765"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Hepher|strong="H2660"\w* had no \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, but \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*: and the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Zelophehad|strong="H6765"\w* \add were\add* \w Mahlah|strong="H4244"\w*, and \w Noah|strong="H5270"\w*, \w Hoglah|strong="H2295"\w*, \w Milcah|strong="H4435"\w*, and \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*.

These \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, and those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ These \add are\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*: of \w Shuthelah|strong="H7803"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Shuthalhites|strong="H8364"\w*: of \w Becher|strong="H1071"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Bachrites|strong="H1076"\w*: of \w Tahan|strong="H8465"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Tahanites|strong="H8470"\w*.\f + \fr 26.35 \ft Becher: also called, Bered\f*
And these \add are\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shuthelah|strong="H7803"\w*: of \w Eran|strong="H6197"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Eranites|strong="H6198"\w*.

These \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w* according to those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*. These \add are\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*.

¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*: of \w Bela|strong="H1106"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Belaites|strong="H1108"\w*: of \w Ashbel|strong="H0788"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Ashbelites|strong="H0789"\w*: of \w Ahiram|strong="H0297"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Ahiramites|strong="H0298"\w*:\f + \fr 26.38 \ft Ahiram: also called, Ehi, or, Aharah\f*

Of \w Shupham|strong="H8197"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Shuphamites|strong="H7781"\w*: of \w Hupham|strong="H2349"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Huphamites|strong="H2350"\w*.\f + \fr 26.39 \ft Shupham…Hupham: also called, Muppim and Huppim\f*

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Bela|strong="H1106"\w* were \w Ard|strong="H0714"\w* and \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w*: \add of Ard\add*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Ardites|strong="H0716"\w*: \add and\add* of \w Naaman|strong="H5283"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Naamites|strong="H5280"\w*.\f + \fr 26.40 \ft Ard: also called, Addar\f*

These \add are\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*: and they that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them \add were\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ These \add are\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*: of \w Shuham|strong="H7748"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Shuhamites|strong="H7749"\w*. These \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Dan|strong="H1835"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*.\f + \fr 26.42 \ft Shuham: or, Hushim\f*

All the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Shuhamites|strong="H7749"\w*, according to those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them, \add were\add* \w threescore|strong="H8346"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ \add Of\add* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*: of \w Jimna|strong="H3232"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Jimnites|strong="H3232"\w*: of \w Jesui|strong="H3440"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Jesuites|strong="H3441"\w*: of \w Beriah|strong="H1283"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Beriites|strong="H1284"\w*.

Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Beriah|strong="H1283"\w*: of \w Heber|strong="H2268"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Heberites|strong="H2277"\w*: of \w Malchiel|strong="H4439"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Malchielites|strong="H4440"\w*.
And the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w* \add was\add* \w Sarah|strong="H8294"\w*.

These \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Asher|strong="H0836"\w* according to those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them; \add who were\add* \w fifty|strong="H2572"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

¶ \add Of\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*: of \w Jahzeel|strong="H3183"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Jahzeelites|strong="H3184"\w*: of \w Guni|strong="H1476"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Gunites|strong="H1477"\w*:

Of \w Jezer|strong="H3337"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Jezerites|strong="H3340"\w*: of \w Shillem|strong="H8006"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Shillemites|strong="H8016"\w*.\f + \fr 26.49 \ft Shillem: also called, Shallum\f*

These \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Naphtali|strong="H5321"\w* according to their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*: and they that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them \add were\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w*.

These \add were\add* the \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* and a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w*.
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,
Unto these the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* for an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* according to the \w number|strong="H4557"\w* of \w names|strong="H8034"\w*.

To \w many|strong="H7227"\w* thou shalt give the \w more|strong="H7235"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, and to \w few|strong="H4592"\w* thou shalt give the \w less|strong="H4591"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*: to every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* shall his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w according|strong="H6310"\w* to those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of him.\f + \fr 26.54 \ft give the more…: Heb. multiply his inheritance\f*\f + \fr 26.54 \ft give the less…: Heb. diminish his inheritance\f*

Notwithstanding the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall be \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* by \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*: according to the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* they shall \w inherit|strong="H5157"\w*.

\w According|strong="H6310"\w* to the \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* shall the \w possession|strong="H5159"\w* thereof be \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* between \w many|strong="H7227"\w* and \w few|strong="H4592"\w*.

¶ And these \add are\add* they that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* after their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*: of \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Gershonites|strong="H1649"\w*: of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Kohathites|strong="H6956"\w*: of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Merarites|strong="H4848"\w*.

These \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*: the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Libnites|strong="H3846"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Hebronites|strong="H2276"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Mahlites|strong="H4250"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Mushites|strong="H4188"\w*, the \w family|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Korathites|strong="H7145"\w*. And \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* \w begat|strong="H3205"\w* \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w*.

And the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of \w Amram’s|strong="H6019"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \add was\add* \w Jochebed|strong="H3115"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*, whom \add her mother\add* \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* to \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* in \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: and she \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* unto \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and \w Miriam|strong="H4813"\w* their \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*.
And unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* was \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w*, and \w Abihu|strong="H0030"\w*, \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w*, and \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w*.

And \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w* and \w Abihu|strong="H0030"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*, when they \w offered|strong="H7126"\w* \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And those that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* of them were \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, all \w males|strong="H2145"\w* from a \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* and \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*: for they were not \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, because there was no \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* them \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ These \add are\add* they that were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* by \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, who \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in the \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* by \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \add near\add* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*.

But among these there was not a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of them whom \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w*, when they \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* of \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*.

For the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w said|strong="H0559"\w* of them, They shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w* in the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*. And there was not \w left|strong="H3498"\w* a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of them, save \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jephunneh|strong="H3312"\w*, and \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*.
